name: That Dream
description:
That Dream is a short 3D horror game.

STORY

You wake up at your office. Alone and don't know what to do, so you decided to play some music and get back to your computer. You hear the music stop by itself and that's where you start seeing some paranormal activities.

CONTROLS

W A S DMoveCTRLCrouchSHIFTRunESCPauseFFlashlight
